Author: RichardStarrkey
Text: My mum works there. Her parents avoided seasoning in food, and she passed that onto my childhood. She also cooks the same things for the children in her care every morning, and in time, if you want, you'll read about my family falling apart and how I almost was orphaned. We talked about butter yesterday afternoon, and I wrote this piece later that night.   It is interesting to know, though unsurprising, that her favourite foods are all fast food. Salty, sweet, high calorie.   I put that, along with how I grew up on that, cheeseburgers for breakfast, and here's this post.

Author: livipup
Text: What does this have to do with the salvation army? I might be a little confused
